bibl.title: The Alexandrian Coins before Zoëga. Avec résumé en danois.
bibl.note: The history of the Roman coins of Alexandria in collections and research from Jean-Foy Vaillant (1701) to Georg Zoëga (1787). - Voir aussi: Om de alexandrinske mønter før Zoëga. [On the Alexandrian Coins before Zoëga], Nordisk Numismatisk Unions Medlemsblad 1990, pp. 70-74, ill.

bibl.title: Florilegium Numismaticum. Studia in honorem U. Westermark edita

bibl.seg: CHRISTIANSEN Erik, The Alexandrian Coins before Zoëga. Avec résumé en danois.
Florilegium Numismaticum. Studia in honorem U. Westermark edita (Stockholm, 1992) pp. 111-118, 1 fig.

The history of the Roman coins of Alexandria in collections and research from Jean-Foy Vaillant (1701) to Georg Zoëga (1787). - Voir aussi: Om de alexandrinske mønter før Zoëga. [On the Alexandrian Coins before Zoëga], Nordisk Numismatisk Unions Medlemsblad 1990, pp. 70-74, ill.
